Create Persona Customise Persona Create a persona to represent your bot
Chat Chatting with %1$s "Send"
Persona Name System Message "You are a helpful assistant"
Settings Version %1$s Build %1$s
API Key Enter your OpenAI API Key here Caution Don\'t share your API key with anyone. Your API key is like a password to your account. If you share it with someone, they can use your account to make requests and incur charges. You can get your API key from %1$s https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys Tap here to visit OpenAI API page "Visit the OpenAI API page to get your API key API Key saved!
Managing tokens Language models read text in chunks called tokens. These tokens are the units used for measuring usage and billing. To learn more visit OpenAI\'s Chat Completion Guide https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/chat/managing-tokens
Usage Usage quotas When you sign up, youâ€™ll be granted an initial spend limit, or quota, and OpenAI will increase that limit over time as you build a track record with your application. If you need more tokens, you can always request a quota increase.
Usage Summary "Visit OpenAI's usage summary, for more accurate usage tracking" OpenAI Pricing "Learn more about OpenAI's pricing" https://openai.com/pricing Your Usage (Tokens) https://platform.openai.com/account/usage Reset Usage Local token counter reset!
Delete Account Are you sure you want to delete your account? Account deleted!
Back Dismiss
Your conversation has been saved.
Waiting for previous response. Request cancelled!
Delete All Bookmarked Chats? This action will remove all bookmarked chats from your device, and is irreversible. All bookmarked cleared!
Invalid API Key!
Display Appearance Dark Dark Mode Light Light Mode Auto System Default Use Dynamic Colors Changes the app\'s color scheme based on your system\'s theme.
Account Logged in as Anonymous UID: %1$s Actions Link Account Link your account to your Google account. Sign Out Logs you out of the App. Deletes your account, and signs you out of the App.
API View or change your API Key. Usage Tokens Dollars Check your API usage information, and estimated cost.

BotForge is an unofficial OpenAI API client for Android. Version Build Number Privacy Policy View the privacy policy of the app. GitHub Submit an issue, bug or feature request https://dheshan.mohandass.com/posts/privacy https://github.com/L4TTiCe/BotForge

Move to next page.
Welcome to\nBotForge! Your platform for creating and sharing Prompts.
Before we beginâ€¦ You will need an OpenAI API key to use this app. BotForge is an unofficial client for OpenAI\'s Chat API. We do not collect or store your API key. Tap to visit the OpenAI\'s API page to get your API key.
"Finally," Do you want to enable user generated content? User Generated Content Allow bots from the community to be displayed in the app Get Started
Name your Chat Chat Title
